definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Entering the club do not take danger things.
sentences.chinese: 進入俱樂部請勿攜帶危險品。

sentences.english: Beware how you handle this dangerous substance.
sentences.chinese: 注意你處理這種危險品的方法。

sentences.english: The Dangerous Goods Store to be provided in accordance with plans approved by the Director of Fire Services.
sentences.chinese: 應依照消防處處長所批准之圖則設置危險品倉。

sentences.english: Do not put dangerous substances into food or drinking containers.
sentences.chinese: 不要把危險品放入盛食品或飲料的容器中。

sentences.english: This is the non-dangerous material, easy to carry the transportation.
sentences.chinese: 本品屬非危險品，易於攜帶運輸。

sentences.english: The production of dangerous material is relatively intensive, while the application is extensive and dispersive.
sentences.chinese: 危險品的生產相對集中，但應用範圍廣且分散。

sentences.english: The names of dangerous articles shall be prescribed and published by the competent civil aviation authority under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 危險品品名由國務院民用航空主管部門規定並公佈。

sentences.english: The optimal routing model for the restraint of hazmat transportation is probed into.
sentences.chinese: 探討了危險品運輸約束最優化選線模型。

sentences.english: This product cannot ship internationally due to hazmat regulations.
sentences.chinese: 本產品不能因危險品船舶的國際法規。

sentences.english: Inflammable and explosive dangerous goods with independent packing shall be attached with a tag of dangerous goods.
sentences.chinese: 對獨立包裝的易燃易爆危險物品應當貼附危險品標籤。

sentences.english: We think such an obvious and preventable hazard should also be dealt with at the national level.
sentences.chinese: 我也期待這種常見易控的危險品也能符合國家標準。

sentences.english: Dangerous articles and valuables are forbidden to be transported as checked luggage.
sentences.chinese: 危險品和貴重物品不得按行李託運。

sentences.english: The article discusses the necessity of digital management of exploder warehouse.
sentences.chinese: 文章簡要論述實現危險品庫房的數字化管理的必要性。

sentences.english: Dangerous goods of IMO Class B carried on deck.
sentences.chinese: 國際危規B等級危險品裝在甲板上。

definition: unidentified origin/no-one knows where it comes from/of dubious background
to violate a prohibition or ban/prohibited/illicit
to make use of one's position to gain profit for oneself or one's associates
lit. a horse that brings trouble to its herd (idiom)/fig. troublemaker/black sheep/rotten apple
